A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt kind of like one of those Superman movies: very long\, numbing really. Just never clicked\, no magic\, boring subplots. Rey\, thanks to that very good actress\, feels real and sincere. Mark Hamill should've had something better to do with these last couple of Star Wars movies. Just a really long and difficult-to-follow mess that ultimately didn't bother to make you care. It'll make a ton of money but it sure wasn't any fun.
